bibl.title: Sources and Approaches across Disciplines in Near Eastern Studies. Proceedings of the 24th Congress, Union Européenne des Arabisants et Islamisants, Leipzig 2008
bibl.seg: "Verena Klemm & Nuha Al-Sha‘ar (edd.), with Lale Behzadi, Stefanie Brinkmann, Sebastian Günther & Martin Jagonak, in cooperation with Beate Backe, Hans-Gerog Ebert, Liza M. Franke, Mareike Koertner & Daniel De Smet, Sources and Approaches across Disciplines in Near Eastern Studies. Proceedings of the 24th Congress, Union Européenne des Arabisants et Islamisants, Leipzig 2008 = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 215."
"Leuven - Paris - Walpole, MA, Peeters - Departement Oosterse Studies, 2013. ISBN 978-90-429-2558-8."
